name: Biblok
description:
Welcome to the universe of Biblok ! Destroy all block to win !

This puzzle game ask you to create wisely a funny chain reactions to lead an explosion and destroy all bloks.


5 items to use :
  • Arrow : to direct the explosion
  • Bomb : to create a cross explosion
  • Hourglass : to contain the explosion for a few seconds
  • Shield : make the block resist to the first explosion
  • Mine : to create other starter of explosion

Each level will ask you a mental flexibility to effectively resolve it.


Make sure you have :
  • Creativity
  • Adaptation
  • Determination
  • Planification
  • and fun to win !
Commande :
  • Simple click to select and dispose item
  • Double click to erase item
  • F4 for fullscreen (windows)
